io.vertx.ext.web.handler

Interface AuthenticationHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Handler<RoutingContext>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    APIKeyHandler, BasicAuthHandler, ChainAuthHandler, DigestAuthHandler, JWTAuthHandler, OAuth2AuthHandler, RedirectAuthHandler, SimpleAuthenticationHandler, WebAuthnHandler

    public interface AuthenticationHandler
extends Handler<RoutingContext>
    Base interface for auth handlers.

    An auth handler allows your application to provide authentication support.

    An Auth handler may require a SessionHandler to be on the routing chain before it.

    Author:
    Tim Fox, Paulo Lopes

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.vertx.core.Handler

        handle
